interface.intro: Blender for Unreal Engine by Xavier Loux.
interface.static_sockets_add_90_x_name: Export StaticMesh Sockets with +90 degrees on X
interface.revert_export_path_name: Revert all export path at each export.
interface.use_generated_scripts_name: Use generated script for import assets and sequencer.
interface.notify_unit_scale_potential_error_name: Notify UnitScale in potential error check
interface.write_text_additional_track_start: This file was generated with the addons Blender for UnrealEngine : https://github.com/xavier150/Blender-For-UnrealEngine-Addons
interface.write_text_additional_track_end: The script must be used in Unreal Engine Editor with Python plugins : https://docs.unrealengine.com/en-US/Engine/Editor/ScriptingAndAutomation/Python
interface.write_text_additional_track_camera: This file contains additional Camera animation informations that is not supported with .fbx files
interface.write_text_additional_track_all: It used for import into Unreal Engine all the assets of type StaticMesh, SkeletalMesh, Animation, Pose, Camera, [...]

tooltips.bake_armature_action_desc: Bake Armature animation for export (Export will take more time).
tooltips.correct_extrem_uv_scale_desc: Correct Extrem UV Scale for better UV quality in UE4 (Export will take more time).
tooltips.skeleton_root_bone_name_desc: Name of the armature when exported. This is used to change the root bone name. If egal "Armature" Ue4 will remove the Armature root bone.
tooltips.rescale_full_rig_at_export_desc: This will rescale the full rig at the export with the all constraints.
tooltips.rescale_full_rig_at_export_auto_desc: Rescale only if the the Unit Scale is not = to 0.01
tooltips.rescale_full_rig_at_export_custom_rescal: You can choose how rescale the rig at the export
tooltips.new_rig_scale_desc: The new rig scale. AUTO: [New scale} = 100 * [Unit scale]
tooltips.static_sockets_add_90_x_desc: On StaticMesh the sockets are auto imported by unreal with -90 degrees on X
tooltips.rescale_sockets_at_export_desc: This will rescale the all sockets at the export.
tooltips.rescale_sockets_at_export_auto_desc: Rescale only if the the Unit Scale is not = to 0.01.
tooltips.rescale_sockets_at_export_custom_rescale: You can choose how rescale the sockets at the export.
tooltips.rescale_sockets_at_export_dont_rescale_d: Will not rescale the sockets. AUTO: 1 ([New scale} = 100 / [Unit scale]
tooltips.static_sockets_imported_size_desc: ize of the socket when imported in Unreal Engine.
tooltips.skeletal_sockets_imported_size_desc: Size of the socket when imported in Unreal Engine. AUTO: 1 ([New scale} = 100 / [Unit scale])
tooltips.export_camera_as_fbx_desc: You can Uncheck this for better export time when you export additional data (Export -> Export filter) and use sequencer import script.
tooltips.bake_only_key_visible_in_cut_desc: Bake camera only when visible in camera cuts.
tooltips.ignore_nla_for_action_desc: This will export the action and ignore the all layer in Nonlinear Animation.
tooltips.export_with_custom_props_desc: Process export with custom properties (Can be used for Metadata).
tooltips.revert_export_path_desc: will remove the folder of the all export path at each export.
tooltips.use_generated_scripts_desc: If false the all properties that only works with import scripts will be disabled.
tooltips.collision_color_desc: Color of the collision in Blender.
tooltips.notify_unit_scale_potential_error_desc: Notify as potential error if the unit scale is not equal to 0.01.
